lead_paragraph: New York City on Wednesday banned the use of chewing tobacco at sports venues such as Yankee Stadium and Citi Field, joining other cities in discouraging Major League Baseball players from a habit with deep roots in the game.

headline.print_headline: New York City Bans Chewing Tobacco at Major League Ballparks
headline.main: New York City Bans Chewing Tobacco at Major League Ballparks
